Learning_Objectives: Understand Azure DevOps services, navigation, basic concepts
Master Git workflows, branching strategies, collaboration
Create and maintain YAML-based CI/CD pipelines
Develop and manage infrastructure using Terraform
Understand containerization, Kubernetes orchestration
Implement DevSecOps practices, security scanning
Configure monitoring, create dashboards, set up alerts
Understand cultural aspects, collaboration, continuous improvement
Integrate automated testing into pipelines
Manage users, permissions, organizations, billing
Implement database CI/CD, migration strategies
Design APIs, implement API management, integration patterns
Conduct performance testing, analyze results, optimize
Implement compliance controls, audit trails, reporting
Monitor and optimize cloud costs, implement cost controls
Implement backup strategies, disaster recovery procedures
Implement complex deployment strategies, advanced patterns
Design microservices, implement distributed DevOps
Implement mobile CI/CD, app store deployment
Develop custom extensions, marketplace publishing
Lead organizational change, adoption strategies
Manage DevOps projects, agile methodologies, risk management
Create technical documentation, runbooks, user guides
Design user-friendly interfaces, usability testing
Provide technical support, troubleshoot issues, escalate problems
Implement data pipelines, data governance, analytics integration
Implement network security, VPN configuration, firewall management
Coordinate releases, manage dependencies, risk assessment
Manage configurations, version control, change tracking
Define and track DevOps metrics, create dashboards, report insights
Implement continuous improvement, retrospectives, optimization
Manage vendor relationships, contract negotiation, SLA management
Identify and mitigate risks, create risk registers, contingency planning
Explore new technologies, innovation processes, technology evaluation
Understand DevOps value, ROI measurement, strategic alignment
